title: Book cover Alfred A. Knopf NY 1991
content:
Book cover by Alfred A. Knopf, NY, 1991. Perhaps a photo font that has not been digitized?  
Any idea is to it's name[s] and/or designer and who sold it?  
Thanks  
Don

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806040055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BookCoverAlfredA_6486.Knoff1991.jpg)
author: donshottype

comments.content: equally Eva Antiqua Heavy or Kuenstler 165.

Thank you, looks like a perfect match!  
Don

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806040055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Kuenstler165BT_4093.jpg)
